main event: A UFO was sighted moving low from west to east at Scott AFB on January 2, 1958.
interesting points: The object was a bright light that changed altitude abruptly while maintaining a level course., Multiple observers reported different shapes and sizes of the object ranging from a pea to a large cigar., The colors reported varied from reddish-white to blue-white flashes., All sightings were made under night lighting conditions., No sound was reported from the object during its flight.
witness description: Reliable military personnel from Scott AFB
